p: After heating or autoclaving, the bottles were chilled in an ice bath prior to separation of solubilized and residual fractions by centrifugation. Four of the runs with Cibenza IDN900 (runs 5, 13, 16, 25) were also conducted with NovoProD (runs N-5, N-13, N-16, N-25) to compare the effects of these enzymes.
